item.title: Report X-2024030359
item.description:
Report X-2024030359

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-29
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was loaded for delivery and was being transported during continuous below freezing temps. Driver coded package for inspection. DescribePack: package was brought back by driver upon my inspection i found that due to below freezing temps and little to no inner packing at the base of the box the product had an inch long crack along the mid- section of the gallon jug. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: gloves were donned then package was placed in hazmat tote lined with a hazmat bag.
